description.value:
Your devices can emit a disrupting pulse that causes tech to malfunction. You gain the following new mod.

Glitch Pulse (exocortex or weapon): Strikes from the modded exocortex or weapon disrupt technology. On a hit, Strikes cause a random tech item held by the target to gain the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.6A2QDy8wRGCVQsSd]{Glitching 3} condition for 1 round. If the creature has the tech trait, the creature must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:mechanic] save against your class DC.

Critical Success The creature is immune to your glitch pulse for 24 hours.

Success No effect.

Failure The creature is glitching 3 for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is glitching 3 for 1 minute.
